title: The Dragon
description: “Believe the hype! Hollis Ward is for real!” - Derek Whitt, Caged Sports.“Tremendous! Hollis Ward commands the cage!” - Steven Adams, Blood, Sweat & Tears Sports.“Breathing fire! Hollis ‘The Dragon’ Ward is taking the MMA world by storm!” - Neil Collins, Elite Martial Arts.“Hollywood has given us incredible movies. Now it's the roots for the phenom Hollis Ward.” - Lance Giles, Sucker Punch Sports.“In the cage, Ward is as fierce as they come!” - Markus Schwartz, MMA Today.“Phenomenal! Watching ‘The Dragon’ compete is pure magic!” - Alex Wong, MMA International."Hollis Ward is the most extraordinary fighter Top Cage Fighters has seen in a long time." - Melvin "Vin" Hasselbeck, TCF President.The headlines shine like gold and tell the world about Hollis “The Dragon” Ward. His record shows his success as a fighter. So, what’s left to say about Hollis Ward?Everything.
author: Cole Denton
